lac.algorithms.acac

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.algorithms.Rule
      • lac.algorithms.acac.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Rule
extends Rule
    Base class for a rule of ACAC. It extends base Rule, but add functionalities to calculate all-confidence and informationGain

      • Rule

        public Rule(short[] antecedent,
            long supportAntecedent,
            short klass,
            long supportRule)
        Constructor for all the parameters forming the rule
        Parameters:
        antecedent - itemset forming the antecedent of the rule
        supportAntecedent - frequency of occurence for only the antecedent
        klass - consequent of the rule
        supportRule - frequency of occurrence for the whole rule

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate(Dataset train)
        It computes the support, supportKlass, and support for each class contained in the dataset
        Parameters:
        train - Given training dataset to be able to calculate supports

      • setMaximums

        public void setMaximums(java.lang.Long rule1,
                        java.lang.Long rule2)
        When this rule is generated, it is generated by the combinations of two rules of size k-1. Its all-confidence will use the maximum value of support from those two parents
        Parameters:
        rule1 - first parent of size k-1
        rule2 - second parent of size k-1

      • getSupportByKlass

        public long getSupportByKlass(short klass)
        Get support for the class specified as parameter. It will be used to calculate informationGain on the classifier.
        Parameters:
        klass - to obtain its support
        Returns:
        the support for the class
